data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 in furtherance to our letter dated January 28 2026 regarding the audio recording of the Analyst/ Investors Earnings call for the quarter and Nine months ended December 31 2025 (Q3 &9M 2025-26) Please find enclosed herewith the transcript of the said call.The said transcript is available on the Companys website.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) 2015 we enclose herewith the Investor presentation on the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and Nine months ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Friday January 23 2026
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI(LODR) 2015 we hereby inform that BOD at its meeting held today i.e. Friday 23 January 2026 has considered and approved the following: 
1. Un-audited Stand and Consol financial results of the company for Quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.
2. Interim Dividend for F.Y.2025-26
3. Purchase of land parcel
4. Sale of immovable property

You are requested to take the note of the same.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015, we enclose herewith the Revised Investor Presentation on the Unaudited Financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2023.Subsequent to the submission of the Investor Presentation on 15th September 2023, it was observed that there were clerical/typographical errors in the presentation.Accordingly, the revised investors presentation for the quarter ended September 30, 2023, with necessary corrections are submitted herewith.We request you to take the above information on record.

data.news_body: A copy of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial results for the quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2023 including disclosures required under Regulation 33 and other provisions of the Listing Regulations as applicable, together with the Limited review Report issued by M/s Kailash Chand Jain & Co. Chartered Accountants, Mumbai, the Statutory auditors of the Company.
